definition: diclofenac sodium (non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller)/also called voltaren 扶他林
pinyin: er4 lu:4 ben3 an4 ben3 yi3 suan1 na4

sentences.english: Under sulfate reduction condition, aniline degradation was incomplete.
sentences.chinese: 反硫化條件下，苯胺降解不完全。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the research advances of polyaniline anticorrosion coatings and different mechanisms of anticorrosion.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了聚苯胺防腐塗料的研究進展及不同的防腐機理。

sentences.english: Experimental results showed that polyaniline films offered good protection for ferrous metals.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，聚苯胺膜對鐵基金屬有很好的保護作用。

sentences.english: The aniline monomer is bad to people's health, but the toxicity of PANI has not been reported.
sentences.chinese: 苯胺單體對人體有害，但聚苯胺的毒性卻未見報道。

sentences.english: The aniline monomer is bad to people's health, but the toxicity of PANI has not been reported.
sentences.chinese: 苯胺單體對人體有害，但聚苯胺的毒性卻未見報道。

sentences.english: Methods Using toluidine blue stains and immunohistochemical ABC methods.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用甲苯胺藍染色和免疫組織化學方法。

sentences.english: Callose stains are aniline blue, resorcin blue and rosolic acid.
sentences.chinese: 胼胝質的染劑是苯胺藍，間苯二酚藍和玫紅酸。

sentences.english: And the applications and prospects of PAn under applied pressure are enunciated.
sentences.chinese: 最後，介紹了聚苯胺在壓力作用下的應用及前景。

sentences.english: A series of dichlorobenzidine Yellow pigments were synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 合成了系列聯苯胺系黃色雙偶氮顏料。

sentences.english: They were made into semithin section, stained in 1% toluidine blue and accurately localized.
sentences.chinese: 製成半薄切片經1%甲苯胺藍染色進行精確定位。

sentences.english: It is necessary to uncover the truth of China's aniline market.
sentences.chinese: 有必樞路示中國苯胺市場的祕聞。

sentences.english: Each of susceptibility of polyaniline before reduction is zero at the different temperatures.
sentences.chinese: 還原前的聚苯胺的磁化率在不同溫度下均爲零。

sentences.english: Polyaniline nanofibers were synthesized by direct mixing reaction in ultrasonic field.
sentences.chinese: 在超聲場下用直接混合法合成了聚苯胺納米纖維。

sentences.english: After the completion of the project, Cornell will become Asia's largest production base of aniline .
sentences.chinese: 項目建成後，康乃爾將成爲亞洲最大的苯胺生產基地。

sentences.english: An ultraviolet spectrophotometry method was used to determine the content of gossypol in the diphenylamine gossypol.
sentences.chinese: 用紫外分光光度法測定二苯胺棉酚中棉酚的含量。

sentences.english: Study of the thermal stability of Ag nanorod with different crystallographic orientation;
sentences.chinese: 探討了鄰甲苯胺在製備銀納米棒中的作用。
